CommonMessages.unknown: Unknown error. Please contact with administrator
CommonMessages.loggedIn: You have been successfully logged in.
CommonMessages.incorrectRevisionError: Cannot update the record because the version is not the latest.

UserMessages.siteIdentificationChanged: Site identification image has been changed

PolicyMessages.ruleErrorFullLogical: The parent logical container can only accept one child.
PolicyMessages.ruleHelperTryAndOr:
If more than one child is required, try changing
it's type, or adding a child of type AND or OR.
PolicyMessages.unableToPersistPolicy: Unable to persist policy in datastore

LoginDialog.sessionEnded: Sorry, your session has ended. To perform your requested action, please Login Again in a new window. When logged-back in, you may return to this window, close this dialog, and then attempt to perform your action again.

LoginTemplate.siteIdentificationExplanation:
Please enter your login name.
Your site image and pass phrase will be displayed here.

404.requestedPageCouldNotBeFound: The requested page could not be found.

ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.enterNewPasswordToChange: Please enter new password in the fields below to change your password.
ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.selectQuestionAndAnserIfYouWant: Please select question and enter your answer if you want to set up a one.
ChangeSecurityDataDialogTemplate.securityQuestionAndAnserExplanation: The Security Question selected and corresponding Answer provided by you will be used to help identify you in the event that you forget your password.

ChangeSiteIdentificationDialogTemplate.siteImageAndPhaseExplanation: The Site Image and Phrase selected will be shown to you upon login to confirm that you are logging in to the genuine site

ForgottenPasswordTemplate.enterLogin: Please enter your login in the field below to continue.

common.name: Name
common.noSubjectAttributes: There are no subject attributes avalible...

manageApplications.title: Applications
manageApplications.description: To modify configured applications, click the application name. You can also select the application to remove it.

editApplications.title: Create Application
editApplications.description: An application (term as used in the Entitlements Service) consolidates policy-related meta data for a specified service. This template is then used when policies are created for the service. To create an application, begin with Step 1 and progress through step 3. Modifications can be made after the application has been created.

manageReferrals.description: To modify configured referrals, click the referral name.

editReferrals.title: Create Referral
editReferrals.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
editReferrals.selectRealmsDescription: Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

managePolicies.description: To modify configured policies, click the policy name. You can also select the policy to remove it or export it.

editPolicies.title: Create Policy
editPolicies.description: To designate the conditions that define access to a protected resource, begin with Step 1 and progress through to step 7. Modifications can be made after it has been created.
editPolicies.step1: Step 1: Define a Policy Name and Description
editPolicies.deleteLogical: Deleting will also remove any objects
editPolicies.manageRulesDescription: To create policy rules, add a Condition or Logical with the buttons below, then drag the item up into the above section. The item can be configured both before and after is has been moved. Only rules inside the top section will be included final policy. To edit a Condition in the top section, just click the edit icon (pencil) or double-click the item.

responseAttributes.subjectAttributesDescription: Use the drop down list or search for subject attributes.
responseAttributes.subjectAttributesPlaceholder: Select or search for subject attributes

summaryReview.applicationDescription: Review the application configuration and click Finish to save.
summaryReview.policyDescription: Review the policy configuration and click Finish to save.
summaryReview.referralDescription: Review the referral configuration and click Finish to save.
summaryReview.advancedFalse: Switch to advanced view state.
summaryReview.advancedTrue: Switch to non-advanced view state.

addResources.patternDescription: Select a pattern from the list below

simpleTime.helper: A time condition must contain one or more of the following values: Time (Start and End), Day (Start and End), Date (Start and End) and/or Time Zone.

conditionTypes.legacyFormat: This condition is in a legacy format, and should be replaced.
